verses.name: Jeremiah 49:5
verses.text: Behold, I will bring a fear upon thee, saith the Lord God of hosts, from all those that be about thee; and ye shall be driven out every man right forth; and none shall gather up him that wandereth.

verses.name: Jeremiah 49:6
verses.text: And afterward I will bring again the captivity of the children of Ammon, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 49:7
verses.text: Concerning Edom, thus saith the Lord of hosts; Is wisdom no more in Teman? is counsel perished from the prudent? is their wisdom vanished?
